name: M0VEMENT
description:
GMTK Jam game made in 48 hours.

The Jam's theme was "Dual Purpose". To fit the theme, I ditched ammo pick ups and instead you generate ammo by jumping and dashing. The combat is bullet-hell-ish so I wanted movement to not only be fun and keep you alive, but to also fuel your weapon. Platforming challenges in-between fights help keep the player's weapon fueled as well.

M0VEMENT is fast paced and fun. Give it a try!
